name: Furnicology
overview:
Our mission at Furnicology.com is to:

  1. Make sustainable design accessible to both designers and consumers.
  2. Provide and outlet for accurate, transparent information on products and their manufacturers.
  3. Increase awareness and understanding of responsible design by providing educational information.
  4. Create a community of designers, manufacturers and consumers to open the dialogue about sustainability, the process and the products.
  5. Show that environmentally responsible products are beautiful!

Transparency in terms of sustainable design is so important in this age of “greenwashing”. Furnicology was created to provide a marketplace for consumers and designers to discover beautiful, environmentally responsible products in addition to providing an outlet for sustainable education. The pieces on Furnicology range not only in price and aesthetic but also range in the levels of sustainability. We strive to bring products that meet many different green criteria, some better than others, however we believe it is important to provide transparent information as well as the right educational tools to allow a designer/consumer to make an appropriate selection based off their needs.
